duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide timely and accurate property and casualty insurance quotes to customers via phone and email solicitations
Meet company performance standards for compliance and process requests for policy endorsements and amendments as requested
Proactively manage sales pipelines and attend internal sales meetings
Communicate coverages of insurance policies, follow up, and always be available to answer questions
Continue to always learn about new insurance programs and product/guideline updates

education_certification.credential: High school diploma/GED required; Bachelor’s degree preferred
Ability to obtain a Property and Casualty, Life and Health Producer License within 30 days of hire and acquire additional state licenses as needed
